Variable.Name: PwrOffDate_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Date of the last power off expressed in seconds (Unix Timestamp, seconds from January 1st 1970)

Variable.Name: OffMins_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Duration of the power off in minutes

Variable.Name: OffHours_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Duration of the power off in hours

Variable.Name: OffDays_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Duration of the power off in days

Variable.Name: LastOnSec_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last second in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnMin_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last minute in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnHour_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last hour in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnDay_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last day in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnMonth_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last month in which pCO was on

Variable.Name: LastOnYear_BLKO
Variable.Comment: Last year in which pCO was on
